controlled_vocabulary.comment: This table is the restricted vocabulary for the column spot measurement units in the table Array Measurements and gives the units in which the spot measurements in the array are given

term.name: fluorescent_units
term.description: ABI instruments often give peak heights or intensities in these units

term.name: photons_per_mm2
term.description: photons emitted per square millimeter for chemiluminescence

term.name: cpm_per_mm2
term.description: counts per minute per square millimeter of surface of emitted particles

term.name: fu_per_mm2
term.description: fluorescence units measured per millimeter squared

term.name: photons_per_mm2
term.description: photons emitted per square millimeter for chemiluminescence

term.name: mol_per_mm2
term.description: number of molecules per square millimeter of surface

term.name: enzyme_activity
term.description: used in colorimetric assays in which linked enzymes provide the detectable product that is measured

term.name: intensity_per_pixel
term.description: provided as the output by some software

term.name: intensity_per_pixels_per_mm2
term.description: provided as the output by some software
